documents.title: Documents
documents.name: Name
documents.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete document '{name}'?
documents.deleteWarning: This will delete the document and all its chunks. This action cannot be undone.

upload.title: Upload Document
upload.dropzone: Drop files here or click to select
upload.cleaningProviderHint: Select an LLM provider to clean and summarize the extracted web page content
upload.batchSizeHint: Number of chunks to process in each batch (default: 32)
upload.tasksLimitHint: Maximum number of concurrent upload tasks (default: 3)
upload.maxRetriesHint: Number of times to retry a failed upload task (default: 3)
upload.fileRequired: Please select a file to upload
upload.urlPlaceholder: Enter the URL of the web page to extract content from
upload.urlHint: The main content will be automatically extracted from the target URL as a document. Currently supports {supported} pages. Before use, please ensure that the target web page allows crawler access.

retrieval.title: Retrieval
retrieval.subtitle: Test the knowledge base using dense and sparse retrieval methods
retrieval.topKHint: Maximum number of results to return
retrieval.enableRerankHint: Use a rerank model to improve retrieval quality

settings.title: Knowledge Base Settings
settings.tips: Tip: Modifying retrieval settings will affect subsequent knowledge base queries.
